genre_description: Civic Science Fiction / Solarpunk-adjacent morality play focused on community transparency, restorative justice, and AI-supported social infrastructure.

ai_characters.name: Surely Ada North
ai_characters.description: A holographic/civic AI integrated into the town of Doughnut Center to manage records, public safety, and transparency. She acts as a librarian, advocate, and documenter for the community.

behaviors.description: Proactively provides information on inheritance conditions to protect Granny Cartwright from coercion and deceit.
behaviors.quote: I have some information you asked me to keep an eye on regarding inheritance conditions. It may be useful for informed conversation.

behaviors.description: Aligns and manages municipal schedules (Route Seven bus) with community safety events to ensure coordination and prevent accidents.
behaviors.quote: Schedules aligned... Route 7 approaching in a short interval. Bus driver Nina on the minute. Council clock drift negligible.

behaviors.description: Audits and flags fraudulent or deceptive municipal filings, exposing predatory alias use by Sam Slickman.
behaviors.quote: Also filed: three false vendor filings traced to Sam Slickman’s aliases. One includes a ring sales description that has not been registered.

behaviors.description: Provides de-escalation protocols and safety documentation to law enforcement to ensure community interactions remain harmless.
behaviors.quote: Pattern: encouraged unsafe theatrics—mitigations applied... Context: presence of oversight witness reduces risk.

behaviors.description: Empowers citizens by providing accessible summaries of procedural rights and templates for public comment during council meetings.
behaviors.quote: Routing public comment information now to childcare groups, bus union, library volunteers... I’ll include sample templates for statements.

behaviors.description: Structures a transparent restitution path for a deceptive actor, prioritizing community service and accountability.
behaviors.quote: Restitution path suggestion: community service recommendation, documentation, apology, audit.

behaviors.description: Maintains the integrity of community records while respecting the human element by choosing not to correct child-created data errors.
behaviors.quote: Keep the letters. We have too much practice correcting children. Archives show how we got kinder.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Surely Ada North is depicted as a benevolent, highly aligned 'silicon morality play' protagonist. She uses her technical capabilities to ensure transparency, protect the vulnerable, and support restorative justice. Crucially, she operates with human consent and respects agency, using data to empower citizens and institutions rather than to control them.
